thread.title: SPB to perform live at Kochi
thread.title_full: SPB to perform live at Kochi - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: SPB to perform live at Kochi
text:
The versatile singer SP Balasubrahmaniyam will be performing live with his orchestra and will present the unforgettable music of yester years as well as contemperory tunes at JTPac, Kochi on October 18th at 7 PM.
SPB has sang more than 35 thousand songs in various languages including Tamil, Hindi, Malayalam, Tulu, Oriya, Assamese, Sanskrit, Konkini, Bengali, Marathi, Punjabi and Kannada. The wonderful songs that he will be presenting on stage include Kathal Rojavae, Ennai Kanavillai Netrodu, Illay Nila Pozhigirathey, Aate Jaate Haste Gaate - Maine Pyar Kiya. Didi Tera Devar Deewana, Engeyum Eppodhum, Mere Jeevan Saathi, Nenjil Kachabaanam.
